channel.title: Arcgis-Pro on GIS, maps + data @ Harvard Library
channel.description: Recent content in Arcgis-Pro on GIS, maps + data @ Harvard Library

item.title: Georeference in ArcGIS Pro
item.description: Open a new map in ArcGIS Pro and select the basemap of your choice Map → Basemap → Open Street Map Set the projection by right clicking the basemap in the Contents pane and select Properties Properties → Coordinate Systems Open the image which needs to be georeferenced Catalog → Folders → Add Folder Connection Right click on ‘Folders’ and navigate to the folder containing the map that needs to be georeferenced.
